beacon.name: BRCA Exchange
beacon.description: Public variant annotations from BRCA Exchange.

info.Comment_on_clinical_significance: IARC class based on posterior probability from multifactorial likelihood analysis, thresholds for class as per Plon et al. 2008 (PMID: 18951446). Class 1 based on posterior probability = 0.00018. Also class 1 based on frequency >1% in an outbred sampleset. Frequency 0.01399 (Asian), derived from 1000 genomes (2012-04-30).
info.Condition_ID_value: BREAST-OVARIAN CANCER, FAMILIAL, SUSCEPTIBILITY TO, 1; BROVCA1 (604370)
